```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
set.seed(seed = 123)
data_dir <- "/Users/aydinkaratas/Documents/usc/chaisson_lab/data"
cigar_file <- "cigar_data.csv"
meta_file <- "20130606_g1k_3202_samples_ped_population.simple.tsv"
```

```{r combine meta data and edit dist data}
meta <- read.csv(file = paste(data_dir, meta_file, sep = "/"), 
                 header = T,
                 sep = "\t")

edit_dist <- read.csv(file = paste(data_dir, cigar_file, sep = "/"), 
                      header = T, 
                      row.names = 1)
colnames(edit_dist) <- c("edit dist", "#X", "#D", "#I", "#*", "#(X,*)")
edit_dist$g <- sapply(rownames(edit_dist), function(x) strsplit(x, "_")[[1]][1])

data <- merge(edit_dist, meta, by.x = "g", by.y = "SampleID")
data
```

```{r edit dist distribution}
summary(data)
```
